Trade/Device Name(s): Nova StatStrip Lactate Hospital Meter System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nova StatStrip Lactate Hospital Meter System and associated test strips, controls, and linearity solutions for quantitative determination of lactate in venous and arterial whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative determination of lactate in fresh venous and arterial whole blood specimens by healthcare professionals in clinical and point-of-care settings to aid evaluation of acid-base status in suspected lactic acidosis; not for use on capillary blood specimens.
